text: Imagine a skincare experience that feels as futuristic as it is effective, where potent essences don’t just sit on your skin but dive deep, rejuvenating from within. The Moya Essence Apparatus is a game-changing innovation by UDL for MOYAL, a beauty brand under SMOORE, the world leader in atomization technology. This sleek and intelligent system is designed to redefine skincare by seamlessly blending technology with rare essences, delivering a ritual that is effortless and transformative. Ever wondered why traditional creams and serums don’t always deliver the results they promise? That’s because they mostly sit on the skin, struggling to penetrate beyond the surface. The Moya Essence Apparatus shatters this limitation using SMOORE’s state-of-the-art atomization technology. Its supersonic peak cutting rate and ultra-fine jet mist nozzle break down the essence into microscopic particles (0.01-0.05mm), small enough to glide past the epidermis barrier and sink deep into the dermis. Designer: UDL Industrial Design And the magic doesn’t stop there. To further amplify absorption, the system includes a high-energy photoelectric penetration enhancer. Controlled electric pulses ensure that every drop of essence reaches the exact layer of skin that needs it most. This three-tiered penetration process results in 43 times greater absorption and three times deeper penetration than conventional skincare, making your daily routine exponentially more effective. The Moya Essence Apparatus isn’t just about cutting-edge skincare, it enhances your entire self-care experience. UDL has meticulously designed every interaction to feel seamless, intuitive, and indulgent. The system consists of three key elements: an atomizer, a penetration enhancer, and exclusive essence capsules. Each component works harmoniously to ensure that high-performance skincare is easy and enjoyable. The Atomizer: Engineered with an innovative stacking design, it houses a powerful yet compact mechanical structure that fits perfectly in your hand. But the real highlight? The flip-cover linkage mechanism was developed alongside the SMOORE engineering team. One smooth motion flips open the top cover, letting you insert the essence capsule with precision. Close it, and the system is ready to use. Need to switch capsules? Just lift the lid, and the used capsule pops out automatically. No mess, no hassle, just pure elegance in motion. The Permeation Enhancer: Designed as a sleek, ergonomic energy ball, this compact device ensures precise application. Its shape allows users to adjust their grip effortlessly, making the process feel intuitive and controlled. The balance of form and function creates an experience that is as tactilely satisfying as it is effective. To complete the experience, the Moya Essence Apparatus comes with a beautifully designed charging and storage base. Its non-directional circular design integrates effortlessly into your vanity, blending aesthetics with functionality. With automatic charging, the device is always powered up and ready to transform your skincare routine, effortlessly combining technology with luxury.
